name: Safarikai
tagline: Safari extension for translating Japanese words
body:
Safarikai is a Safari extension to translate Japanese words on web pages.

Inspired by rikaichan and rikaikun, with love for Safari.

### Download

[Safarikai.safariextz](http://ashchan.com/uploads/Safarikai.safariextz)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
